name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"881ec62a-f48e-497a-8675-6490b7307b6d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"init","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fa79607c-a37e-47a9-9ac2-cb84c17fd82f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method constructs and configures a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Fasten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" formatter instance that is ready to generate FASTEN-compliant output. It binds the formatter to a call graph generator and captures all package-level metadata required to describe the analyzed software artifact.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dc885acc-a5ab-4526-a3a4-e4dab27a5ef5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This method also initializes and normalizes the complete internal state of the formatter by collecting structural and behavioral analysis data upfront. All subsequent FASTEN transformations operate exclusively on this prepared internal state.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"410dcc6a-31e5-4f06-b6e8-1e68c559c28a","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e4c3b34e-1c85-4054-afe4-9694a7d7b8dd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of this method is to establish a stable and self-contained formatting context. By eagerly loading all analysis results and metadata during initialization, the formatter avoids repeated calls to the generator and ensures consistent data usage across dependency extraction, namespace mapping, class hierarchy construction, and call graph generation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2de11ece-0d14-40ff-8273-370aceb488f1","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"536441d0-8551-45ac-b5b4-981817a6b453","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"214bdee0-51f2-4643-a88f-85d71de32356","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"During execution, the constructor performs the following steps:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8df1c032-3f3d-4e9b-975b-2b9603cdeeca","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Stores a reference to the provided call graph generator for traceability and context","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a5b33820-cf9b-445e-8613-bbd325fdb835","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Extracts internal module definitions, including source files and namespaces","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"04e92249-b1cc-4958-87ec-8449d136960c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Extracts external module references used by the analyzed package","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8fb90038-bcf3-49fc-8b47-a578cd7d6f7e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Loads class definitions and method resolution order (MRO) data for hierarchy construction","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b25b1343-f62e-4a42-aff0-38bd4f9c4357","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves call graph edges representing invocation relationships between namespaces","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"efa7d34b-45be-424b-9aa4-80cee36fb1a7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Collects the set of known function names to support accurate URI generation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d99d782c-437b-4a15-8df0-609d23a54735","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Initializes a monotonically increasing counter used for namespace identifiers","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dd1233d9-2614-4866-8149-c72a7d9dfaac","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Creates an empty namespace map that will later link URIs to numeric identifiers","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8df636f8-3b11-4725-a265-ed64b907e26e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Stores package metadata such as product name, forge, version, and timestamp","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c6fc753a-c868-4a0f-9035-0e6905e8286f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"All extracted data structures are normalized using defensive defaults (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to ensure the formatter remains functional even when partial or incomplete analysis data is provided.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7a58bf24-3d0e-4486-8e78-11fc71d06eb5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"2fc1d066-df89-4d1b-9b7c-5ef2d58cfaa6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3833f160-809f-4827-bcbc-0ca6a4b9ef65","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This method acts as the foundation for the entire FASTEN formatting pipeline. Every other method in the class relies on the internal state established here, making ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" critical for correctness, consistency, and reproducibility of the generated FASTEN output.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bae1c7ad-f1e8-4476-8513-a7fe0cbacda1","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"5b691c3a-2015-484e-988c-d01f21e454cb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"69e01d84-6d44-4d99-b195-245e970472d4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Eager initialization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" simplifies downstream logic and improves readability","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0def5f0e-812c-4162-a789-2328656097ee","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Defensive defaults","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" increase robustness against missing generator outputs","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"aea00bcc-c3e4-460e-9a50-91788ff0153e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clear separation of concerns","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" keeps analysis generation and FASTEN","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7342275c-204b-49e7-8a81-8c2fa0616d50","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
